mapper.select: select comment_number, comment_content, comment_date, community_number, c.member_number, member_nickname from member m join community_comment c on community_number = #{communityNumber} and m.member_number = c.member_number
mapper.insert: insert into community_comment(comment_content, community_number, member_number) values(#{commentContent}, #{communityNumber}, #{memberNumber})
